name: Brian Burke
text: Went to the Grand Opening event today and I have to say this Blaze looks amazing!!!! Customer service at this location even when super busy was the best of any restaurant I have ever been too. Pizza was served hot and fresh! I love the fire ‚Ä¶More

name: jeannine g
text: Ordered a large 1 topping and food tasted very good. Fast pickup service.  I liked the extra time taken to cook more than the average pizza place so the cheese doesn't drip off the pizza.

name: Phillip Fusilier
text: Wife and I dined there for first time Today. Sat on the covered patio. Overhead fans kept us cool. We both order 11 in. BYO. I had almost everything on mine, but the kitchen sink.  Crispy crust, very tasty and plentiful things to add on - ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Allen
text: Well pleased with the service and food. Not a long wait for your order.

name: Michelle Alessio
text: Neatest concept of a pizza parlor I've ever seen. Works much like a sub buffet. Pay the price add whatever your little heart desires. The white sauce is absolutely fantastical. The cauliflower crust was cooked perfect every single time. Nice that they offer beer and wine as well as a neat choice of delicious teas!

name: Marissa Boyd
text: The pizza was ok. It wasn't too bad except for I didn't like the burned taste in my mouth. Their garlic knots were pretty good though. But friendly service.

name: chris benner
text: Built my own pizza. My pizza was great except that salt was mixed in with the oregano I asked for. Besides that I was disappointed mostly in the customers ignoring the sign that asked them to get a new cup for refills... not a good way to ‚Ä¶More

name: Ermano
text: On a completely unbiased note, blaze is sooo good. And no I'm not just saying that because I work here. Also sub to my YT channel @YahBoiYukiüòÖ

name: Stacy Munford
text: It was my first time there,  They explained everything to me.  The food was great and the staff was friendly.  It was clean and the had Social Distancing in place. Very reasonable prices. I will be going back.

name: Bill Largin
text: The pizza was very good.  A good value and fast service.   We look forward to going back.

name: Amy Kay Furtys
text: Great option for personal size pizza. Lots of topping options, even gluten free dough and vegan cheese.

name: George Phillips
text: My wife loves this restaurant so we went for dinner! ‚ÄúHarry‚Äù Alex‚Äù and  ‚Äúshelbs‚Äù made the night  by making pretty  pizzas while incorporating  good conversations. The sweetest hospitality! We appreciate a clean environment!

name: Jacob Bradley
text: It's a really fun experience. I think you need to ask for extra cheese or toppings with some items they are a bit skimpy the first time they put it on. But it's fun to add as many toppings as you want to a build your own pizza. It's really ‚Ä¶More

name: Joyce Gayle
text: I had to go twice in two days! Best pizza EVER! Cauliflower crust is so tasty and gluten free. And all the delicious toppings! What a treat! Went to two locations, loved them both!

name: Allen Olson
text: Welcoming staff, friendly employees. Pizzas can be individuals as well as larger pies to share. Salad and deserts to order. Blaze and TBone very helpful. Suggestions offered. Pesto sauce excellent to round out pizza flavor. Fast service and ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachel Collins
text: GO GET SOME PIZZA! Blaze is back and running loved eating  in a safe clean environment. The pizza is so awesome! Looking for good (byo pizza) blaze is the way! The take two is my favorite! The sweetest workers and great lemonade! ‚Ä¶More

name: Bert Green
text: This chain is new to me, but I really like it.  A genuine pizza oven instead of a conveyor belt.  This means that the skill of cook matters, which means that sometimes it's a little burned but overall it's very good.  Staff has always been very friendly and helpful.  Overall I'd recommend the place.

name: Chris Shveyda
text: Amazing service! I ordered through door dash for me and my three roommates and they never showed up for the delivery. Received a call from Doug letting me know what happened, and offering to get another delivery driver out. When that didn't ‚Ä¶More

name: John Hurley
text: Consistently mix up orders. Tried the cauliflower crust or rather rice starches sugars and cheeses with smidge of cauliflower for an additional 4.50. The 4.50 is buried in the menu listing so you are likely to order and then go hmmmm. Oh ‚Ä¶More

name: Dave Whiting
text: I've had decent pizza at other Blaze locations in town but this one consistently serves under cooked pizza.  The bottom and tops are cooked but I'm guessing in an attempt to push out pizzas faster, even when slow, they are cooking at too ‚Ä¶More

name: Donnaneil Cole
text: Great experience at blaze pizza. For lunch they were very busy but the staff was so incredibly nice! They had one  girl making the pizzas but she was fast and so sweet !!! Very pretty eyes with the Orange hat ‚Äúshelbs‚Äù also my pizza was the ‚Ä¶More

name: Hope Karnik
text: Blaze pizza for the win again!!  They are so great here.  Especially when you happen to have clumsy kids.   Thank you Blaze!

name: Kevin Rington
text:
Family friendly place!  Everyone looked üòÅ happy
Fantastic pizza, the cauliflower crust is amazing!
My family and I wanted pizza and this is the Friday night spot. Big line but was ‚Ä¶More

name: Marleni Bruner
text: Same great staff, friendly and doing their best during these tough times. Need to find a better way to still get seas salt and oregano on pizza once it comes out the oven.

name: Lonnie Yunker
text:
Pizza was good
Customer service was horrible!!
Rude ‚ÄúManager‚Äù type wearing a mask with his nose hanging out, no greeting, no ‚Ä¶More

name: James Clemens
text: Wonderful eating experience. From the friendly staff to the delicious pie and unique drink blends, Blaze Pizza is on FIRE!

name: Samantha Carpenter
text: I love their gluten-free pizza and they do a great job of keeping gluten separate from the gluten-free stuff. üíØ

name: carol johnson
text: The lady making the pizza was so great I left a top

name: Stuart T
text: Food was as excellent as always. We each got pick 2 so we got a good size side salad and half of a customizable pizza. The Blaze employees were genuinely in a good mood today and that made us feel very welcome as we ate our lunch.

name: Ashley Guy
text: Dave is great! He goes above and beyond to help staff and customers. This is my favorite pizza shop in town. The employees are so friendly and the gluten-free build your own is so tasty!

name: Lisa Norris
text: There were no lines and no waiting. Staff was nice and cooked my pizza as requested but the garlic knots were a little overcooked to my liking. The store was clean too.

name: Robert Seitzinger
text: We showed up for an early dinner. The staff was waiting in a group for the dinner rush to start.  All the team members went to their stations to help make our pizzas.  The process was easy and the pizza makers double checked with us at each ‚Ä¶More

name: J Angulo
text: Shelby and Shay were AMAZING! Always great service & yummy perfected pizza! My favorite eatable art :) Thank you night crew you rock!

name: Ian Wootan
text: Tasted like Flatbread Pizza Company, but a little bit better.

name: Jamie Morrell
text:
10 stars for Blaze Pizza
First time ever. Awesome employees and very good Pizza and garlic knots. And beer

name: Andre juneau
text: Delicious as always. Excellent meal while supercharging. Tough call between this and Tijuana Flats

name: Michelle Lewis
text: I love blaze pizza! What a great friendly environment full of amazing workers and very fast! Just the smiles and good conversations while making the pizzas is just so great. A big  appreciation  For a few workers. This guy with an orange ‚Ä¶More

name: Carlos Yingst
text: Tired at the end of a drive from Marathon Key today and needed some pizza after a week of seafood binging, we found Blaze Pizza tonight and, wow, what a great pizza. Price is Right and the pizza even better. Infinite customizing for one price. We'll be back. You want something different AND better, this is it!

name: Matthew Nakhel
text: Really fast and delicious pizza

name: George Warren
text: Great pizza..... always made like you want it.

name: Susan Yingst
text: You can put all the toppings you want on your pizza. You can do a half and half if your other half doesn't like all the stuff you do and it's still just one price! One pizza is enough for 2 to share. Very friendly staff. Will definitely go back again.

name: kandiekj100
text: Think Subway or Chipotle but for pizza. it's great being able to personalize your pizza anyway that you wanted with any toppings or sauce that you want. Even get to decide what type of crust you want. It was a great experience and the pizza was really delicious.

name: Fabian Orozco
text:
KETO PIZZA!!

My girlfriend and I are are on a Low Carb Diet so we tried the KETO Pizza and it ‚Ä¶More

name: Carolyn Walden
text: Love the BYO salad and pizza!

name: Mary Farmer
text:
Wow,  it was delicious.
I ordered 1/2 and half.  Pizza and salad. You get to pick all you're toppings for both and different veggies and cheeses.  They cook it fast and hot and they both were delicious. The crust was crispy, not soggy.

name: Dylan Blair
text: I have literally never seen as good customer service as I receive every time I visit this Blaze in my life. I've been the GM of two separate food service businesses and I would do anything to have Lauren, Tori, and Brandon as the face of my ‚Ä¶More

name: Adrienne Sutton
text:
OMG Pizza & salad at the next level
of fresh, build your own pizza and salad or already  their unique already made salad. Family friendly Wonderful atmosphere..what are you waiting for go!

name: KeChaunda Gilcrease
text: Always fresh because it's made to order. At this particular Blaze, we received the most attention that I have ever gotten dinning in here.  I must say they checked on us at least 3 times and cleared our table.  I'm not sure if it was because we were the only ones there at the time or if this is normal but they are super friendly!

name: karla balch-reno
text: This was the first time I have been to a Blaze Pizza.  I really loved it!  It was so nice to be able to have so many choices and so much variety for pizza toppings! I wish we had these at home.  I am so glad that I was able to come and dine ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Mayfield
text: Love Blaze and love this location. They are fast, clean and delicious.  They are also committed to the community as the last time I visited they were hosting a local school fundraiser with a percent of the proceeds going toward the school.

name: Vay Drogion
text: Fast and offers many different combinations to suit any mood.

name: Mark Taylor
text: I'm only rating 5 stars because the bathrooms smell like mandarin oranges and that's amazing

name: Steve Sullivan
text: The man working the pizza oven and serving pizza is too sick to be handling food. In addition to touching his face coughing and blowing his nose he keeps touching his hair and not using the the plastic gloves.

name: John Oxford
text: Great pizza! Enjoyed it and great people working there!

name: Desire Jordan
text: Delicious fresh pizza!! What more can you ask for! Built to order right in front of your face!

name: Mary W
text: Gluten-free crust, presto sauce, parmesan, black olives and mushrooms - yum!

name: Jason T. Aho
text: Not bad, definitely not great. I've had frozen pizzas that taste better. Friendly staff, quick service, and seemed to be clean.

name: Josh Keller
text: I have nothing but good to say about this place. Very professional, great service, great food!

name: Dan Bellamy
text: I've enjoyed my trips to Blaze Pizza.  The food is quite good and it's satisfying watching them assemble it to your order right in front of you.  Today I had a pepperoni pizza and a salad.  It's a pleasant surprise how good the Greek salad is at this pizza restaurant.

name: Robin Kent
text: Fantastic pizza great price choose your own toppings! Fast moving line. Pizza cooked in fired oven.

name: Carlos Baker
text: Great customer service. Amazing pizzas. Even a keto friendly crust.

name: Adam Stallard
text: Great option for fast, thin-crust pizza.

name: Terry Kori
text: Imagine, if you will, that you could enjoy eating a pizza of your own design. Now imagine that countless toppings are available, and you can have a little or a lot of any of them. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sven Markert
text: The restaurant was clean and the service was exceptional. Friendly, helpful staff. All toppings were fresh and the pizzas were cooked and served quickly. Delicious!!

name: William Ramsey
text: Great experience and very good pizza. Second time there and both visits great.

name: Carlos Franco
text: I went to this location monday, which isn‚Äôt normal to me because it‚Äôs out of my way, but I‚Äôve heard plenty of good things about it so i decided to try it. The food was spectacular and the pizza cook with the pinnapple on his hat i don‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

name: Frank N
text: Been back many times.  Great service  and great ingredients.  Pizza and salads are always the best choices.

name: F T
text:
Delicious! One of the best made-to-order pizzas in the area. You can order in store or on the app; both are efficient.
The only knock is that they don't offer the sea salt/oregano option with their online ordering.

name: L GUYAS
text: We have visited at least 2 locations.  It is fun to pick your sauce, pick your toppings, and - voila! - your pizza is done in about 5 minutes.  They are big enough that 2 of us can split one.

name: dennis huffman
text: It's the one of the worst pizza I've ever had. A one topping pizza had maybe one piece of sausage on any single piece. Put enough sauce on the pizza to cover a olive. I don't get it.

name: Sloane Grey
text: Amazing pizza! Fresh & real ingredients! Great staff! Worth the 8-9$ easily! The pizza is light and has a perfect crisp to it! Highly recommended. Go to this one on Thomasville rd

name: Sondra Brittle
text: My favorite pizza spot. The best personal custom pizzas without all the guilt of a thick crust. Waiting for a low carb crust option.

name: Tc Williams
text: Outstanding pizza

name: Ashley Caplinger
text: The quality of the toppings to choose from are out of this world. The staff is extremely welcoming and friendly. Great service, great food. I will definitely be coming back and recommending to friends.

name: Paul Syfrett

text: It's my first time at Blaze Pizza and I am definitely going to visit again. Pizzas were cheesy and delicious. They have variety of toppings and sauces for build your own pizzas apart from their signature pizzas. Atmosphere inside the ‚Ä¶More

name: killer kdi
text: Love the pizza, been in four or five times,  usually very nice staff, tonight got the  we really don‚Äôt care if you‚Äôre here or not  attitude from the cashier and pizza cooker.  Too bad I really like this place, time for the management to do a little attitude check up on employees.

name: Nate Long
text: Our whole fam loves Blaze Pizza. We've been there a few times and love the selection of toppings and non-standard drinks. We recently went there for the Pi Day promotion and as expected it was super packed. Despite the crazy busy nature of ‚Ä¶More

text: I had the cauliflower pizza crust with my favorite toppings it was good.

name: Gina Clemens
text: I like this place a lot. The employees are very sweet and my food was excellent!

name: tracie ivey
text: Excellent, excellent, excellent! Very good food for a small price! Tons of topping choices!

text: it was good. just good, not off the chart. but im sure i will go again

name: Mandy Simmons
text: I only withhold one star because the First time I went I encountered a blustery snide dismissive asst. manager who actually smart mouthed to me almost as soon as I walked in.  How he got into a leadership position I do not know.  I nearly ‚Ä¶More

name: Drew Hall
text: It's like subway for pizza, but it's great pizza. The sodas and fruit drinks are delicious

name: Pam Burkett
text: I always order the build your own and have them cook it well done. The employees always do an awesome job. Blaze in my opinion run circles...pun intended...around their competitors. I don't have to concern myself with with those ADDITION charges for extra jalapeno peppers. YAY!

name: Stephen Danna
text: Love the pizza here. The build your own is the way to go. So many toppings to choose from that every taste can be satisfied, a little extra of this and a little extra of that is no extra charge!! Fresh hot pizza in just a few minutes. One ‚Ä¶More

name: Lee Bostic
text: This Blaze location is always friendly and helpful. The gluten free continues to be a phenomenal option but doesn't make sense why it is not included on items that are considered on special. For example, if I have a deal for $2 off any pie, that should be included not an exclusion.

name: Logan Runn
text: First time there and it was great, service was excellent

name: Tyler Scott
text: One of the best places to go to for pizza made your way!  They have pretty much every topping you could want.  Best root beer in town!

name: Emory Dean
text: Loved the atmosphere and friendly staff. The man who took my order came by to check on me as I ate and addressed me by name! I‚Äôve never experienced that before and it blew me away. The pizza was delicious and made with quality ingredients. Try the blood orange lemonade!

name: Scott Westbrook
text: Friendly service, good fast food.

name: brittany mcgill

name: Brandon Peterson

name: cvaria EX
text: Great pizza, outstanding ambiance

name: Big Time Gaming
text: Great experience! The young lady behind the counter took her time and explained everything to me. They were very friendly and it was a good experience. The pizzas are small but they pack on the toppings . Good experience, better meal!

name: Tracy Smith

name: Joseph Gates

text: Fast, and clean. Build your own pizza is my go-to choice here. Not real crazy on in-house choice of sodas, but the Coke was good.
